Line9.FD362: Stay strong, and know that I am and always will be proud of you. No distance could ever change that.
Line5.FD362: The Drowned are closing in, and l fear I will never see you nor your mother again. Enclosed is an amulet passed down from my father.
Line1.FD362: Padrig, I know this may never reach you, but I couldn't live with myself if I didn't try.
